com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Class KUnitSphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r1.kernel.types.KUnitSphere
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.io7m.jcanephora.JCGLResourceSizedType, com.io7m.jcanephora.JCGLResourceUsableType, KUnitSphereUsableType

    @EqualityReference
public final class KUnitSphere
extends Object
implements KUnitSphereUsableType
    A unit sphere, with its center at the origin and radius 1.
